meanings.definition: To emit a strong, unpleasant odor.
meanings.sent1: The garbage stinkpots in the summer heat.
meanings.sent3: The old shoes stinkpots worse than a skunk.
meanings.sent4: The rotten eggs stinkpots throughout the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The fish stinkpots after being left out all day.
